author: Xbox
description:
A Safehouse in the Hills, the monumental new GTA Online update, is now available.

For those who have reached the highest rungs of the criminal ladder, celebrate your triumph with a painstakingly crafted palace in one of Los Santos’ most exclusive neighborhoods, complete with breathtaking views, the finest amenities, and countless ways to customize and make it your own,

Plus, an all-new action-packed adventure — along with exquisite new vehicles to collect, the return of a familiar face, and much more.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/grand-theft-auto-online-xbox-series-xs/9NKC1Z4Z92VN

author: Xbox
description:
For a limited time, save up to $100 on the ROG Xbox Ally and experience seamless PC gaming on the go. Plus, get 3 months of Xbox Game Pass Premium included.

Offer available until 12/20/25 or while supplies last at participating retailers. ​Requires internet connection (ISP fees apply). Products may not be available in all markets. Images are illustrative. See specification pages for details. Device specifications vary by model and are subject to change. ​Claim within 30 days of device activation. Payment method required. Subscription continues at regular monthly price unless cancelled. Eligible existing Essential members will upgrade to Premium. For Ultimate members, the code will convert at a ratio. xbox.com/code-conversion. Terms apply. Game catalog varies over time, by region, device, and plan. https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass.

author: Xbox
description:
This is how we play now. From award-winning titles to blockbuster games, including Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7, South of Midnight, and The Outer Worlds 2, find your next adventure on any device with Xbox Game Pass.

Get more with Xbox Game Pass and join the adventure across console, PC, and cloud. With new games added all the time, there’s always something to explore.

Join Xbox Game Pass today at https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

author: Xbox
description:
People of Note is coming to Xbox in 2026!

Cadence is played by two actors: Heather Gonzalez alongside the pop-star vocals of @LEXXE.
 
Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/people-of-note/9NB2TF2P011B 

About People of Note:
In this turn-based RPG musical, join Cadence as she recruits an ensemble of musicians on her quest for stardom. Experience turn-based combat like never before, where each battle is a musical performance with evolving combat conditions and genre-bending mashup attacks!

© 2025 Fractal, LLC. Developed by Iridium Studios, LLC. Published by Annapurna Interactive. All rights reserved.

author: Xbox
description:
The Super Animal World expansion for Super Animal Royale is now available for free! Explore a new persistent Social Hub, where you can relax, meet NPCs, embark on quests, and enjoy cozy activities like fishing, bug catching, and hamsterball racing, between brutal fights to the death.

Join your super friends in a living social world, where you can explore, unwind, and matchmake straight from the Social Hub into competitive modes, including Animal Royale, The Bwoking Dead (infection mode), and SAW vs Rebellion (control point mode). After each match, return to the Hub to continue the Circle of Super Life.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/super-animal-royale/9n872vfsppql
